mapper.select: SELECT TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_CC, EMAIL_BCC, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_BODY, FILE_AS_BODY, ENABLED FROM ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE ORDER BY TEMPLATE_ID

SELECT TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_CC, EMAIL_BCC, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_BODY, FILE_AS_BODY, ENABLED FROM ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE WHERE (upper(TEMPLATE_ID) like upper(#{searchTerm}) or upper(TEMPLATE_NAME) like upper(#{EVENT_NAME}) or upper(EMAIL_SUBJECT) like upper(#{searchTerm})) ORDER BY TEMPLATE_ID

SELECT TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_CC, EMAIL_BCC, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_BODY, FILE_AS_BODY, ENABLED FROM ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE WHERE EVENT_NAME=#{eventName} ORDER BY TEMPLATE_ID

SELECT TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_CC, EMAIL_BCC, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_BODY, FILE_AS_BODY, ENABLED FROM ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE WHERE EVENT_NAME=#{eventName} AND ENABLED=1 ORDER BY TEMPLATE_ID
SELECT TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_CC, EMAIL_BCC, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_BODY, FILE_AS_BODY, ENABLED FROM ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE WHERE TEMPLATE_ID=#{templateId}
SELECT TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_CC, EMAIL_BCC, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_BODY, FILE_AS_BODY, ENABLED FROM ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE WHERE TEMPLATE_ID=#{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE ( TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_CC, EMAIL_BCC, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_BODY, FILE_AS_BODY, ENABLED ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(TEMPLATE_ID)+1 FROM ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE), #{templateName}, #{eventName}, #{emailFrom}, #{emailTo}, #{emailCc}, #{emailBcc}, #{emailSubject}, #{emailBody}, #{fileAsBody}, #{enabled} )

UPDATE ECX.EMAIL_TEMPLATE SET TEMPLATE_ID=#{templateId}, TEMPLATE_NAME=#{templateName}, EVENT_NAME=#{eventName}, EMAIL_FROM=#{emailFrom}, EMAIL_TO=#{emailTo}, EMAIL_CC=#{emailCc}, EMAIL_BCC=#{emailBcc}, EMAIL_SUBJECT=#{emailSubject}, EMAIL_BODY=#{emailBody}, FILE_AS_BODY=#{fileAsBody}, ENABLED=#{enabled} WHERE TEMPLATE_ID=#{templateId}
